title: That’s My Television
description: The popular ’80s sitcom about a normal family and their television.
quote: Hope you saved room for dessert!
altHero: RGB2, a television with a face and robotic arms, baking in the kitchen
alt1: RGB2 and the family aghast next to a humongous, melted cake
alt3: RGB2 is sad as the kids fight over the remote
alt4: RGB2 comforts the sister on her bed as she cries
